title: Favorite/least favorite Running animation in League
body:
Hey all,

I'm conducting some research and would like to know what is everyone's favorite and least favorite champions running/walking animations are in League. Also how would people feel if we try spice up some of the worst? By spice up I mean, polish, add some improved animation tweaks. Whilst maintaining the essence of what is there already and how we identify with it and the champ.
Ill go first:

Favorite - Kindred {{champion:203}} , I like the energy/hoppy-ness.
Least Favorite - Quinn {{champion:133}} , Lack of motion/feels very rigid.

We recently did a very subtle polish on Jarvan cause his run was REALLY wobbly/janky.

Cheers and let me know your thoughts!

replies.body: {{champion:82}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:82}}

I don't want to be that one but I am going to be that one:

{{champion:43}}  - Still doesn't have a running or shield casting animation for 5 years now. Maybe you should finally give her one?

{{champion:39}}  - I like her's because she rides on her blades.
FIX OUR BABY! {{champion:133}} PLEASEEE SHE LOOKS LIKE THE HUNCHBACK OF NOTRE DAME WALKIN TO LANE
Bring back valor, best running animation

Favorite: {{champion:13}} Fluid, carries an air of importance 
Least Favorite: {{champion:104}} Clunky, looks like his pants are constantly falling down

Favourite: {{champion:74}} specifically the second walk animation where he swaggers like his old model did.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xlRFkcPdgQ8
(god I loved his old walk, thank god some of it was retained in the new visuals)

Least Favourite : {{champion:54}} : His overall animation needs work, or better yet just give him a Full Relaunch.

> [{quoted}](name=Tesla Effect,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=xBX3bl5R,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-08-15T20:29:52.271+0000)
>
> Favourite: {{champion:74}} specifically the second walk animation where he swaggers like his old model did.
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xlRFkcPdgQ8
> (god I loved his old walk, thank god some of it was retained in the new visuals)
> 
> Least Favourite : {{champion:54}} : His overall animation needs work, or better yet just give him a Full Relaunch.

The legendary swagger walk! An internal fav too, Heimer introduced the toggle ability which we now use sometimes, ala Zoe, Aatrox and a few others via ctrl+5
As far as I know (unless you guys already fixed that), activating your passive overrides the swagger walk amd causes you to stop using it. Was it already fixes? And if not, can we hope for a fix?

{{champion:7}}  - definitely not the worst offender but her running animation could be improved to make it look more natural. Right now she looks kinda like she was just walking extremaly fast not fully running. Her animations are stiff. Her legs and hands look like pretty weird and like they were broken or something. It's especially noticable on Mistletoe LB skin. Her cape could be updated to float behind her more fluid aswell.
[Image](https://imgur.com/a/kDVs4Vu)

{{champion:114}}  - bring back her old pre-rework running animation PLEASE. I just hate how she's hopping around with her knees high up to the sky. Her old running animation looked so much better and more badass. Now she looks goofy and out of place just like she was some kind of clown...The update also ruined her Headmistress skin. Before rework it used to have animated skirt which slightly floated back and forth when Fiora moved. Her new model and running animation removed that feature from the skin.

Favorite is probably Kled.  The chaotic dashing on Skaarl-back fits the character perfectly.
Least favorite's gotta be Blitzcrank.  The giant metal golem swinging his huge metal arms around like they're hollow and made of cardboard just seems off.  I know that it's kind of popular as a meme, so maybe that's just me.

I would be 100% in favor of spicing up some of the poorer animations.

Favorite - {{champion:498}}{{champion:497}}  , it's somehow smooth
The least favorite - {{champion:43}}  looks like she's wearing diapers
Rammus has the WORST walking animation in the game, it looks like he's walking on his heels.

Could use a good touch up:
{{champion:34}} The flapping is just... odd looking, doesn’t flow well.
{{champion:143}} ... She’s just so ugly when running AND walking...
{{champion:16}} Not a fan of her running cause it’s very dull.
{{champion:43}} She deserves more. A better run animation might touch her up a bit!

{{champion:43}} : the worst running animation is no running animation. On a champion  who consistently speeds themselves up.

{{champion:201}} : IM COMING TO SAVE YOU!
Great point on Karma. Its not a base run but its certainly something worth making note of.

{{champion:142}} - favorite. by far.

{{champion:25}}  - least favorite.

I hate how morgana's dress doesnt flow at all. her wings tilt back and forth like she's waddling.
Nidalee's pounce looks awkward if you don't have the passive buff.

I'm the opposite with {{champion:203}} i love the idea of them hoping around but at high speeds it looks really weird to me at least
Favorite though {{champion:21}} or{{champion:498}}

> [{quoted}](name=Ararararararagi,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=xBX3bl5R,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2018-08-15T20:42:03.265+0000)
>
> I'm the opposite with {{champion:203}} i love the idea of them hoping around but at high speeds it looks really weird to me at least
> Favorite though {{champion:21}} or{{champion:498}}

Kindred was a challenge, for the base run I think we got it right, but I agree as you say the homeguard could be improved. You can check a making of from that run here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OWHmFDDVFlw if your interested. We went through quite a few ideas.

{{sticker:sg-ahri-3}} {{champion:25}} : hi, i dont have legs

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}} {{champion:28}} : hi, i have legs <3

{{champion:203}} I'm surprised you like, I find it the worst, same from a lot of kindred players I've talked to. Just looks so weird and out of character for lamb to turn ape mode. There was more potential, like lamb riding wolf during homeguard. It looks goofy and not in a d'aw way.

{{champion:60}} I kinda wished you'd have her ride her seat from her splash art on a chariot carried by spiders, similar to santa braum? This would emphasize on her spider queen thematic, and I think it would fit her personality. She doesnt have a homeguard atm.

Bad edit i know but something like this?

https://i.imgur.com/J20u3E4.png?noredirect

You could make death blossom be a flower, victorious be a throne, bloodmoon be a web of corpses like her splash, SKT be a gaming chair, SG be her recall chair.

Also I'd like to know why D in these concepts was scrapped as a potential homeguard for super galaxy, was it just rushed?

https://cdnb.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/007/871/255/large/zeronis-sg-elise-ingame-thumbnail-02.jpg?1509044977

Idk what to do for spider form homeguards, i'd leave them be or lock them in skittering frenzy's animation (but give SG that animation for the love of god.)

Elise's run animations look fine though but give her some modern polish with homeguard animations at least pls.

____

But anyway, least favorite probably is kindred actually 
Favorite is {{champion:28}}
Astronaut Skins definetly have the best walks

> [{quoted}](name=Tomat0H3ad,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=xBX3bl5R,comment-id=0018,timestamp=2018-08-15T20:44:59.716+0000)
>
> Astronaut Skins definetly have the best walks

Funny you mention that as a feeling of weight can be really satisfying in movement anims lol

Karma{{champion:43}}  cuz she's using her E so often and having so much MS but literally has no special animation for running :x
Also her normal walking animation looks off (you see it mostly on OotL) her legs seem very wierd or atleast the knees.

Favorite {{champion:432}} 
Least favorite {{champion:16}}

Favorite - Evelynn {{champion:28}} Sleek movement and the way she runs fits her character and model very well.

Least Favorite - Viktor {{champion:112}} Rigid, lacks motion, and sometimes seems wonky when moving at very high speeds.

{{champion:50}} He jus' doesn't give a fuck about anything. My favorite.

{{champion:110}} He walks really lightly, like a brisk jog. I love how he looks when he's charging the bow, but the normal walking is kinda enh.

Brace yourself for a moment.

When you guys gave {{champion:114}}  and {{champion:98}}  "VGUs" you didn't do anything to their animations, except maybe add a stray one here and there. For supposedly being updated champions, neither Fiora NOR Shen have modern animations like recalls or homeguard runs, perfectly looping dances, and their VOs are still the ones they launched with. I find this completely unacceptable for champions you've supposed invested time in to "VGU." I would propose going back to Shen and Fiora and giving them the animations they need to be complete. 

Tying into your topic, Shen especially needs his run animations addressed, because his run animation is absolutely terrible, and his heels "click" mechanically as he runs and it looks super awkward. Aside from him and much older champions who obviously need more work than just running animations, I don't like {{champion:4}}, {{champion:7}}, {{champion:102}}, and {{champion:67}}'s running animations. TF's and LB's are just stiff and stale, and they're not particularly interesting, and Shyvana just lurches around, similar to Vayne. Both of these ladies could also use some physics work on their ponytails to move a little more freely, like Lissandra's hair.



On a side note, other champions in the category of "Got model updates, but didn't get an animations overhaul or VOs, yet are claimed to be VUs or VGUs" are {{champion:21}} {{champion:27}} and {{champion:12}}. In the same boat, but with a VO is {{champion:57}}. In a vaguely similar boat, but needs more extensive work because they still look ancient and terrible are {{champion:37}} and {{champion:38}}.

{{champion:45}} is pretty bad
{{champion:202}} is pretty good

Favorite - Lucian{{champion:236}}, good progression in different animations, moves characteristically of an agile gunman.
Least Favorite - Karma{{champion:43}}, only has her one jog animation, no walk, no faster run, which is disappointing because she has speed boosts in her kit. Doesn't inform anything about the character, just a very basic jog.

I don't much care for Kindred's{{champion:203}} Homeguard animation, it looks like she's loping, which makes sense for a lamb-thing, but with the bow in her hand, she only does it with one arm, it looks kind of awkward and evokes the image of a gorilla more than a lamb. The animation also usually only plays when she's running at speeds so fast that you can't actually tell what she's doing and it doesn't look great.

Favourite walk/run animation - {{champion:202}}   his strut is seriously on point.
Least favourite walk / run animation - {{champion:82}} {{champion:53}} - they both feel really janky in comparison to the recent champion releases/reworks.
Seeing a lot of favorites for the Jhin swagger walk, and swagger walks in general so I made this little vignette of the boss himself swaggin! https://youtu.be/Y6yeYln4bxk

Favorites:
{{champion:39}} I mean, it's obvious. Her animations in general are just so fluid and wonderful to look at.
{{champion:555}} I love the rogue-y feel to his run cycle and the transition into Ghostwater Dive is amazing.

Least favorites:
{{champion:44}} I mainly dislike how floaty he looks in his normal running animation and how his right arm is always sticking out. Looks really uncomfortable.
{{champion:133}} FIX. HER. POSTURE. PLEASE. My back hurts just looking at her {{sticker:sg-janna}} 
{{champion:143}} Just kind of a boring run cycle in general. I know she doesn't have much to work with but I feel like it could be a little less stiff at least.

Hard to choose a favorite, although I always have liked {{champion:15}} so I guess I'll throw that out there.

But among the worst is {{champion:53}}. I'm sure he'll get a VGU at _some_ point, but his base model running is just so horrid to me. I know he's a clunky steam golem, and its probably hard to depict something that heavy and awkward moving quickly, but his sprint is just so awkward and overly clunky, almost to the point of being violent to look at.

I personally really like Pyke's W swimming run emote and Kai'Sa E running emote the most, least favorite has to be Zac's because of the bug where he sometimes walks instead of slingshotting somewhere with his E, it looks really weird when his walk is sped up like a weird power walk. 
Oh yeah Kassadin's is real weird, I don't like how sometimes he's floating up a little when walking, Leblanc is also pretty wack

Favorite Walk/Run animations: {{champion:201}} {{champion:432}}  {{champion:427}} 

I picked these because each of them conveys the theme of the champion very well and matches their in game personalities. Braum gives off the feeling of confidence and urgency in his run. Bard gives the feeling of being divine since he is not running at all. He more or less floats along with a few intermittent steps. Ivern gives a very light hearted feel because of his jumpy long stride and almost floaty feel as well.

Least Favorites: Champions that don't have a set sprint animation

This is a general outlook on the question. The champions that don't have a sprinting animation are very apparent put against the likes of Sion, Galio and Eve. More specifically, the champs that have a very distinct or large motioned walk animation like Veigar or Blitz look very accelerated rather than just running. Whereas someone like Shen looks okay even though his normal run does not change when sped up. The champs that don't change their motion but the speed of the motion when increased makes it look off are my least favorites.

Least Favorite: {{champion:43}} It's really rigid and ew and doesn't transistion well at ALL 

Favorite: {{champion:163}} It's so fluid and nice feeling. The transistion between being on her passive and then back to walking needs work though. Tends to have a second of jarr betweem.

Most: {{champion:202}} {{champion:427}} Both have a lot of personality and give off how the character acts just by looking at them.

Least: {{champion:51}} {{champion:77}} This is mainly cause I feel Cait needs a visual update and Udyr needs a full VGU, but because of that their walks look really janky and even more so when they get sped up.

Edit: Just remembered: {{champion:143}} and {{champion:43}}'s walks/runs look super awkward to me; would like to see them updated as well.

Favorite - {{champion:28}} {{champion:127}}  D I V A !

Least Favorite - {{champion:81}}  {{champion:143}} looks really bad

When eve was reworked there was a delightful animation of her homeguard run animation that had her rapidly running on her tail thing. It was deemed a little bit too silly to actually be the live run animation, but did it ever sneak in anywhere as an easter egg type thing? And can we have more of that?

https://youtu.be/c2qnH_aWgcs
{{champion:32}} seems outdated all over the place

Favorite {{champion:60}} (human form): i love her elegance while maintaining her spider essence with those swings with her arms and not resulting goofy at all with her long legs ( ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ). [Side note: her homeguard is awful though, she feels like is twitching, not running]
Least {{champion:7}} : she should be elegant, gracious and "ethereal" because she is elusive and illusionary , given her famous gameplay kit. Right now she is anything of the things said above. She feels like a wooden plank (not that type of "wooden plank" like {{champion:222}}, in that sense she is the opposite ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)), she is so rigid, she doesn't feel gracious at all like {{champion:60}} for istance. She should be way more relaxed and "swingy" even for her aa animations giving also a much more natural feeling of  lightness. She should feel ephemeral while instead when you look at her you feel like you went back in front of a catwalk in Milan if Armani was short on his budget for models and was given a model with a wooden plank attached to her back, a courset and fiddlesticks arms. Gurl, come on! Relax!

Proof that i do care about this: all skins on {{champion:60}}  (350k mastery) and all skins on {{champion:7}} (220k mastery).

Edit: if i have to compare how {{champion:7}} should feel, i would say she should feel pretty much like {{champion:28}} .

Favorite
{{champion:39}} I like how the blades just hover around her idk why
Least favorite
{{champion:8}} I dont like how his arms just kind of flay to his side

Least Favorite: {{champion:115}} - I remember using him in an One for All game and his Running animation was awfull... basically because those short legs, I guess that Ammumu, Veigar, Rammus and Teemo may have the same problem.

Favorite: Without counting legendary skins or champions that dont really "walk/run"(they fly, float or use another thing like an animal or car) i would say {{champion:19}}
Fix Quinn please! Although I guess the problem is more her idle stance... any chance that could fall under the scope of your project?

> [{quoted}](name=Quínn,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=xBX3bl5R,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2018-08-15T20:40:10.259+0000)
>
> Fix Quinn please! Although I guess the problem is more her idle stance... any chance that could fall under the scope of your project?

Sorry probably not. Soon as you start changing Idle poses it can have a big knock on effect causing changes to several other animations thus increasing scope. We can get away with tweaking runs fairly easily though.

I think Zoe jumping rope is pretty funny. 

I remember a lot of people liked project vayne when that came out
